attributes.action: stop the closure of Darley Dene Infant School, Addlestone,Surrey.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Surrey County Council are planning to close this school in 2008 just as over 300 houses are being built in the area. We believe this to be a shortsighted move.
The school is an integeral part of our community and its loss will have a detrimental effect on the children and families in one of the poorest wards in the county.
